result.execSummary:
All charges against Marvin D. Williams in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Marvin D. Williams is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Case dismissed on State's motion

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Zach Brost appeared for the State.  Deft appeared along w/Atty Angela Cunningham.  All parties appeared via Zoom.  State moves to dismiss for the reasons set forth on the record.  No objection by the defense.  Case dismissed on State's motion.

Minutes:  Hybrid hrg.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Jennifer Phan appeared in person for the State.  Deft appeared via Zoom along w/Atty Angela Cunningham (via Zoom).  Victim rights compliance.  Case is resolved.  During plea colliquey, deft mentioned he has some questions.  Plea hrg interrupted - Plea hrg set over to 3/26/21 @ 10:30am.

Minutes:  NO RECORD TAKEN.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Deft appeared via Zoom along w/Atty Angela Cunningham (via Zoom).  Defense requests an adjournment - ongoing negotiations.  No objection by the State.  FPT 2/12/21 @ 9:30am
Oral appt - Angela Cunningham
Final pre-trial on January 19, 2021 at 11:00 am.

Minutes:  Proceedings conducted via Zoom.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Deft appeared via telephone.  Deft presently hospitalized in Arizona.  Discussion held with deft, nurse, & respiratory therapist.  Court sets case over to 1/19/21 @ 11am.  Court will appoint advocate counsel as well for the deft.  

Note - deft presently resides at Peoria Acute Post & Rehabilitation, Respiratory Floor, 13215 N. 94th Dr, Peoria, AZ 85381 - ph #623-815-4050
left for deft regarding court appearance on 10/30/20 @ 11:45am; message relayed the zoom codes as well

Minutes:  NO RECORD TAKEN.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  No appearance by deft.  Deft's sister previously called - reported the deft was in a rehab facility in Arizona.  Deft contacted DA's office - left message.  Per Court, set hrg for 10/30/20.  Deft to appear via Zoom

deft's sister called - she resides in California.  Deft presently residing in Arizona in a rehab facility; was found unresponsive.  Presently has a trach - difficult for him to speak.  Clerk suggested she contact the DA's office to provide them with this information
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
signed and returned on 09/02/20

DEFENDANT HAS 7 DAYS UPON RECEIPT OF EMAIL TO SIGN BOND OR A WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED.

Plea of Not Guilty entered by the court.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 11, 2020 at 01:15 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 8, 2020 at 10:00 am.  Jury selection scheduled for October 26, 2020 at 09:00 am. 4750   Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).
